sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import {connect} from 'react-redux'; import {go, stop} from '../actions'; const Controller = ({dispatch}) => { const handleGo = (e) => { const direction = e.target.innerHTML const payload = {} payload[direction] = 'green' dispatch(go()) } const handleStop = (e) => { const direction = e.target.innerHTML const payload = {} payload[direction] = 'red' dispatch(stop()) } return (
) } export default connect()(Controller)
